title: Dominate Beast
content:
. Dominate Beast is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Dominate Beast Information

Description: Make a beast fight alongside you. Every time the beast takes damage, it makes a Wisdom Saving Throw against your domination. Level: Lvl 4 spell School: Enchantment School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: WIS Save

How to Acquire
